ch0193_00_aogiri/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re free, I’d be happy to hang out with you,
kiddo! Bwahahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0601_0701_01_10: In any team, you gotta have a leader.
ch0193_00_aogiri/0601_0701_02_10:
As long as you got someone who knows what
they’re doin’, the rest of the team’ll just naturally
come together.
ch0193_00_aogiri/0601_0701_03_10:
If you got what it takes, I think you could make
yerself a darn good team, kiddo!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0602_0701_01_10:
The ocean is a special home for all
living creatures.
ch0193_00_aogiri/0602_0701_02_10:
But humans and their fat egos have dirtied and
destroyed our precious ocean!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0602_0701_03_10:
And because of that, they’re makin’ innocent
Pokémon suffer... But I’m not gonna let that keep
on happening!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0603_0701_01_10:
Pasio may be an artificial island with a lot of
nature, but I gotta say, the ocean’s the best thing
about it! It’s so beautiful, it captivates my soul!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0603_0701_02_10:
You gotta remember this beauty—carve it into
your memories!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0603_0701_03_10:
If you’re feelin’ like all this beauty might be
worth protectin’...
ch0193_00_aogiri/0603_0701_04_10:
Then you just might be the perfect fit for
Team Aqua! Bwahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0604_0701_01_10:
Listen up, kiddo. If you got yerself a dream you
wanna achieve, you can’t be gettin’ discouraged
along the way.
ch0193_00_aogiri/0604_0701_02_10:
That feelin’ of wantin’ to make your dreams come
true will make you and your Pokémon stronger.
ch0193_00_aogiri/0604_0701_03_10:
Don’t waste time! Just get out there and charge
right at your dreams! Bwahahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0604_0701_04_10:
If any obstacles get in your way, just forge your
own path by busting ’em down!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0605_0701_02_10:
Your skill in battle and your attitude toward
Pokémon are just as good as anyone’s in
Team Aqua!
ch0193_00_aogiri/0605_0701_03_10:
Heh... I never knew you’d be such an interesting
little scamp!
ch0193_00_aogiri/1701_0701_02_10: I found this on the beach, but I’ll give it to you.
ch0193_00_aogiri/1701_0702_01_10:
I was thinkin’ of throwing that away, but I’m glad
you can use it.
ch0193_00_aogiri/1701_0702_02_10:
Who knew picking up trash on the beach could
lead to something this good! Bwahahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2501_0701_01_10:
I wanna meet all kinds of sync pairs on Pasio
that have different values—and find new folks to
join us!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2501_0701_02_10: That’s my vision for the future of Team Aqua!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2501_0701_03_10:
Interesting folks are always welcome to join
Team Aqua... That means you, too, kiddo!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2501_0702_01_10:
I can’t explain why, but I got a feeling you’d make
a big splash in our organization if you joined us.
ch0193_00_aogiri/2501_0702_02_10:
You just got a certain somethin’ that makes people
and Pokémon wanna be around ya!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m always tryin’ to think of the future and push
forward for the sake of Pokémon and Team Aqua!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0701_02_10:
That said, I may have a thing or two in the past
that I kinda regret.
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0701_03_10:
Sometimes, I remember those moments when I
least expect it.
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0701_04_10: Make sure you live your life without regrets, kiddo.
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0701_05_10:
Work hard and play hard! Battle to your heart’s
content! Bwahahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0702_01_10:
You may be a little scamp, but I like the cut of
your jib.
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0702_02_10:
How ’bout I make you an honorary member of
Team Aqua?
ch0193_00_aogiri/2511_0702_03_10:
You could join me in bringing the ocean—no, the
world—back to its unsullied origins!
ch0193_00_aogiri/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re lookin’ spry this morning, little scamp.
Don’t get too excited and wind up hurtin’ yourself
or anything! Bwahahaha!
ch0193_00_aogiri/3003_0701_01_10:
The seas around Pasio sure are beautiful.
You’d do well to take in the sights here while
you can.
ch0193_00_aogiri/3005_0701_01_10:
Run along home now! It’s too late for little scamps
like you to be out and about! And, uh, I guess you
might catch a cold or something...
